Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Data accuracy rate within the PDM system.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of accurate data entries in the Product Data Management (PDM) system relative to total data entries.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Accurate Data Entries / Total Data Entries * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Number of products managed per PDM user.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average number of products managed by each user in the Product Data Management (PDM) system.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Number of Products / Total Number of PDM Users

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Score evaluating the completeness of product data entries, including all required fields and accuracy.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Complete Data Entries / Total Data Entries * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Time taken to update product data.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time required to make updates to product data in the Product Data Management (PDM) system.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Time to Update Data (Time Taken for Updates / Number of Updates)

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Percentage of products with updated specifications.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of products that have their specifications updated in accordance with current standards and requirements.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Products with Updated Specifications / Total Number of Products * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of time the Product Data Management (PDM) system is operational and available for use.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Uptime / Total Time * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Number of data integration issues resolved.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Total number of issues related to data integration that are successfully addressed and resolved.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Number of Data Integration Issues Resolved

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time required to retrieve product data from the Product Data Management (PDM) system.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Time to Retrieve Product Data

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of configuration items that are accurately documented and managed.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Accurate Configuration Items / Total Configuration Items * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Configuration item change request cycle time.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to process and implement a change request for a configuration item from submission to completion.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Time for Change Requests (Total Time for Requests / Number of Requests)

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Degree to which version control practices for configuration items adhere to established standards and procedures.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Adhered Versions / Total Number of Versions * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Total number of audits performed to assess the accuracy and compliance of configuration items and processes.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Number of Configuration Audits Conducted

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Percentage of configurations compliant with standards.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of configurations that meet established internal or external standards.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Compliant Configurations / Total Number of Configurations * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of users or departments adopting and using the configuration management system for their needs.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Users Adopted the System / Total Number of Users * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Accuracy of identifying configuration items correctly according to system records and standards.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Accurate Identifications / Total Identifications * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Configuration management cost per configuration item.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average cost associated with managing each configuration item, including administrative and operational expenses.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Cost of Configuration Management / Total Number of Configuration Items

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time taken for a change request to be reviewed, approved, and authorized.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Time for Change Request Approval (Total Time for Approvals / Number of Approvals)

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of change requests that are successfully implemented without negative impact or failure.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Successful Changes / Total Number of Changes * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Total number of emergency changes that are processed outside of regular change management processes.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Number of Emergency Changes Processed

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Total number of change requests that are pending or awaiting action.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Pending Change Requests

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average satisfaction level of users with the change management process, often measured through surveys or feedback.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: User Satisfaction Scores / Total User Responses * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Score indicating how well the change management process follows established procedures and best practices.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Adhered Processes / Total Number of Processes * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of change impact analyses that correctly predict the outcomes and effects of changes.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Accurate Impact Analyses / Total Number of Impact Analyses * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Change management cost per change request.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for processing and managing each change request.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Cost of Change Management / Total Number of Change Requests

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Accuracy of cost analyses performed throughout the product lifecycle, including development, production, and maintenance.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Accurate Cost Analyses / Total Number of Cost Analyses * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Variation between planned and actual duration of each stage in the product lifecycle.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Duration of Lifecycle Stages - Planned Duration / Planned Duration

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) by product lifecycle stage.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Financial return measured at different stages of the product lifecycle, calculated by comparing benefits to costs.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: (Net Profit from Stage / Cost of Stage) * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Rate of reduction in environmental impacts associated with the product lifecycle through improvements and efficiencies.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: (Previous Environmental Impact - Current Environmental Impact) / Previous Environmental Impact * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Customer satisfaction at different lifecycle stages.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Satisfaction levels of customers measured at various stages of the product lifecycle, including pre-purchase, usage, and post-purchase.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Scores at Various Stages

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Time to market by lifecycle stage.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time required to move a product from conception to market release at each lifecycle stage.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Time from Concept to Market for Each Lifecycle Stage

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Efficiency of transitioning between different stages of the product lifecycle, measured by time, cost, and smoothness of transitions.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Transitions / Total Number of Transitions) * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Analysis of trends in profitability throughout different stages of the product lifecycle.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Analysis of Profit Trends Across Different Lifecycle Stages
